duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide labor and delivery care, ensuring the safety and well-being of the mother and baby.
Assist with postpartum care and recovery, addressing the needs of new mothers and babies.
Utilize NICU skills to care for premature and high-risk babies.
Deliver compassionate and attentive patient care throughout the maternity process.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to respond to emergency situations and provide critical care support.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and colleagues to ensure high-quality care and support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or a related field (Master's preferred)
RN license in the state of Idaho
RN license in the state of Oregon within six months of start date
American Heart Association Basic Life Support for HealthCare Provider (BLS/HCP) certification
ACLS and NRP certification required or obtained within six months of hire date
PALS, STABLE, and NCC-EFM certifications required or obtained within one year of hire date
